com.r00li.rhome

Class MediaPlayer

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.r00li.rhome.MediaPlayer

  • public class MediaPlayer
extends java.lang.Object
    Media player Class. Currently handles XBMC media player support. Itunes and other players should be added later. Based on the official XBMC remote for android. To be replaced with a custom system at a later date.
    Author:
    Andrej Rolih
